title: search.mcbbs..net/search.php无法搜索
author: ItsZeroHikari
txt_content:
本帖最后由 tutity_tiger 于 2019-8-5 22:55 编辑 

RT,搜就是跳转到search.mcbbs..net/search.php?mod=forum,无法搜索
[多加点是故意的,因为会被替换掉]

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 用右上角的搜索还是一整个页面都是搜索的那种

replies.author: ItsZeroHikari
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2019-8-5 22:51
明明是跳转到https://www.mcbbs.net/search.php?mod=forum
